mushroom_red.name: Red Mushroom
mushroom_red.description: A bright red mushroom, sometimes edible, sometimes poisonous.

mushroom_brown.name: Brown Mushroom
mushroom_brown.description: A common brown mushroom found in forests.

stick.name: Stick
stick.description: A simple stick, useful for crafting or as fuel.

elfroot.name: Elfroot
elfroot.description: A rare herb prized for its healing properties.

iron_shard.name: Iron Shard
iron_shard.description: A small piece of iron ore, useful for smithing.

goat_milk_bulb.name: Goat Milk Bulb
goat_milk_bulb.description: A rare plant that stores nutritious goat milk.

herb_mountain_mint.name: Mountain Mint
herb_mountain_mint.description: A fragrant mint herb found in the mountains.

reeds.name: Reeds
reeds.description: Tall, flexible plants found in swamps and wetlands.

glowcap_mushroom.name: Glowcap Mushroom
glowcap_mushroom.description: A bioluminescent mushroom that glows in the dark.

leech_sap.name: Leech Sap
leech_sap.description: A sticky sap harvested from swamp leeches, used in alchemy.

wild_wheat.name: Wild Wheat
wild_wheat.description: A staple grain found in the plains.

prairie_flower.name: Prairie Flower
prairie_flower.description: A beautiful wildflower native to the open plains.

buried_arrowhead.name: Buried Arrowhead
buried_arrowhead.description: An ancient arrowhead unearthed from the plains.

driftwood.name: Driftwood
driftwood.description: A piece of wood washed ashore by the tide.

salt_crystal.name: Salt Crystal
salt_crystal.description: A chunk of crystallized salt from the coast.

pearl_fragment.name: Pearl Fragment
pearl_fragment.description: A small fragment of a pearl, valuable to jewelers.

cactus_fruit.name: Cactus Fruit
cactus_fruit.description: A sweet, juicy fruit from desert cacti.

scorpion_shell.name: Scorpion Shell
scorpion_shell.description: The tough shell of a desert scorpion.

sunstone_shard.name: Sunstone Shard
sunstone_shard.description: A radiant shard of sunstone, warm to the touch.
